src/actim

    Dark Mode

Example:

import src/actim

let style1 = newVStyle:
  "padding": 5.px
  "background-color": "#44ffaa"

template repeateCount(n: int, body: untyped): VNode =
  buildVNode "div":
    for i in 1 .. n:
      ++ text(i, ":")
      body

proc buildDom: VNode =
  var testText {.global.} = "foo"

  buildVNode "div":
    style: newVStyle:
      "font-weight": "bold"

    handle "click":
      testText = "ba"

    ++ text testText

    ++ "a":
      attr "href": "/"
      ++ text "ho"

    ++ "br"

    +> repeateCount 3:
      style style1
      ++ text "foo"

setRenderer buildDom

Imports

actim/vdom, actim/vstyles

Exports

$, ++, +>, ++, $, setRenderer, extendVNode, VNode, buildVNodes, handle, style, ChangeRootElementIdError, ++, setRenderer, attr, EventHandler, text, newVNode, buildVNode, redraw, tagName, vh, /, extendVStyle, EmptyStyleSelectorError, /, vmax, vmin, pathSelector, newVStyle, em, px, $, merge, *, *, Size, -, -, pct, vw, renderVStyle, +, *, VStyle
